title: Import statement
info: Import your bank statement in OFX format. After uploading, transactions will be processed in the background and will be available shortly on the transactions page.
description: Select a <bold>.ofx</bold> file exported from your bank to automatically import your transactions.
dropzone: Drag or click to select an OFX file
invalidFile: Invalid file. Please check the format.
successAlert: File uploaded successfully! Your transactions are being processed in the background and will be available shortly.
step1: Export the OFX statement from your bank's website or app.
step2: Select the file here and click Import.
step3: The file will be uploaded and processed in the background.
step4: In a few moments, your transactions will appear on the transactions page.
invalidFileType: Invalid format. Please select a .ofx file
